title: Will Oce get the rotating gamemodes?
body: As our pop is low will we be getting it? we missed out on dominion and Draft que so i hope we get it.

replies.body:
At this point, we cannot see any reason why we shouldn't have the rotating queues.
We will monitor them of course to make sure they stay in a healthy space and don't affect negatively other queues.

Seeing we don't have the dynamic queue on normals, I'm thinking that will suffer. The main reason I avoid playing normals solo is because I hate the roll calling/arguments for every game. Without the dynamic queue, I think the normal queue will definitely suffer from this. I avoid playing ranked as I hate the toxicity (guess I could just mute everyone at the start).
So when does Normal Blind Pick get replaced with Normal Dynamic like it was promised to do so back during the preseason?
